summary: Changes several NPC\'s to be a bit improved (imo), including 11 children (optional). 3 parts - I which is mainsteam NPCs, II which is minor ones, and III which is children.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=6]Description:[/size][/b][/color]
Changes several NPC\'s to be a bit improved (imo), including 11 children (optional). There are three core components:

[color=#5ea2e5]Better NPCs[/color] - Made but not released yet since I have one big esp for all my changes but it has many I wouldn\'t want to release. Will be things like Housecarls and a few more popular NPC\'s.
[color=#5ea2e5]Better NPCsII[/color] - part two, which changes a few more minor NPC\'s rather than the very mainstream changed ones.
[color=#5ea2e5]Better Children[/color] - changes several children (only girls thus far), mostly giving them eye color rather than that soulless evil black stare they have in vanilla *shudders*

I\'ll go into detail regarding each core component now:

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=4]Better NPCs[/size][/b][/color]
[color=grey]Not released[/color]

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=4]Better NPCs II[/size][/b][/color]
[color=red][u]Requirements:[/u][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] - ApachiiHair.esm, ApachiiHairFemales.esm

[color=#5ea2e5][b]The following NPCs were changed:[/b][/color]
Gerdur - I just never really liked how she was so dirty and I made her prettier while I was at it
Sigrid - Just some improvements to her. You can\'t have her anyways, so it\'s kinda taunting you.
Carlotta - She\'s supposed to be propositioned by every man in Whiterun, so I made her look the part (imo).
Roggi Knot-Beard - He was my favorite marriage option in vanilla but he just didn\'t have a very attractive face - I changed that. He should be a much better catch now.
Balimund - Another improvement for marriage options. Since he\'s an option, I decided to improve him a bit.
Vorstag - Same as the other two men. He\'s a marriage option, so I made him purdy. :P

Yeah yeah, you made them \"better\" (so you say!)... whatever. Let me see them!
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/40510-2-1376778912.png[/img]
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/40510-1-1376778912.jpg[/img]

If you want Serana and Valerica in similar style, grab [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40341]Serana and Valerica Redone[/url].

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=4]Better Children[/size][/b][/color]
First up, they\'re still potato head clones. So if you have a mod that changes them completely and you prefer that you probably don\'t want this. This is just some very minor changes.

[color=red][u]Requirements:[/u][/color]
Hearthfires DLC

[color=#5ea2e5][b]Children changed:[/b][/color]
Mila Valentia - given blonde hair and green eyes to match her mother in part II
Babette - given pale skin and black hair
Braith - given darker redguard skin and amber eyes
Dorthe - given some eye color
Runa Fair-Shield - eye color
Hrefna - eye color
Svari - eye color
Sissel - eye color
Britte - eye color, slight hair color change
Lucia - eye color
Sofie - eye color

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/40510-1-1376780298.jpg[/img]
[i]Note: Babette will have vampire eyes and fangs, she\'s just inherited my vampire eyes. She\'ll have whatever ones you have in your game.[/i]

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=6]Changelog:[/size][/b][/color]
August 26, 2013: 1.1 - Better Children: Babette given a black blood stained dress.
August 17, 2013: 1.0 - Better NPCs II, Better Children initial versions
author: XunAmarox
